title: B/A Products Co. 1/2" x 20' Grade 100 Cradle Grab Hook Hi-Viz Chain - – Truck Source
text: B/A Products Co. 1/2" x 20' Grade 100 Cradle Grab Hook Hi-Viz Chain - H10-1220SGG B/A Products Co. 1/2" x 20' Grade 100 Cradle Grab Hook Hi-Viz Chain - H10-1220SGG 1/2-Inch Grade 100 Cradle Grab Hook Hi-Viz Chain available in 20' Length For the kind of jobs that require unrelenting strength and durability, you cannot go wrong with using the reliable 1/2" Grade 100 Cradle Grab Hook Hi-Viz Chain from B/A Products Co. Available in 20’ lengths, this is the kind of heavy-duty chain tie-down assembly that is reserved for the more difficult jobs that require a stronger and more stabilizing grip on the vehicle or object. An excellent choice for a variety of applications, the chain is able to handle a working load limit of 15,000 lbs., offering reliable strength for where it's needed the most. Designed to promote safer work, the chain is designed with highly visible yellow and is weather resistant. A durable and solid cradle grab hook is installed on both ends of the chain. This hook is engineered to offer unrelenting strength when it comes to gripping the vehicle's securement point. Designed with a wide and deep throat, the hook can also be used to connect with other chain links.
